solution_line_template: Over the three weeks, they will have watched a total of {last_week_hours} + {week_before_hours} + {next_week_hours} = <<{last_week_hours}+{week_before_hours}+{next_week_hours}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours of television.
The average number of hours per week is {total_hours} hours / {number_of_weeks} = <<{total_hours}/{number_of_weeks}={average_hours}>>{average_hours} hours of television.
